com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.commands
Class CommandRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.MultiRegistry<ProjectNode,CommandRegistry.Entry>
      com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.commands.CommandRegistry

public class CommandRegistry
extends MultiRegistry<ProjectNode,CommandRegistry.Entry>

Registry of context menu commands. The AssetList uses the registry to populate its context menu.

          An entry in the command registry.

Method Detail

get

public List<CommandRegistry.Entry> get(Class<? extends ProjectNode> key)
Returns the list of configuration settings for the key class and all superclasses. This implementation returns the entries according to their insertion order.
